programme.title: Talkin' Funny Cars: Matt Hagan
programme.desc: Four-time Funny Car world champion Matt Hagan sits down with Buddy to talk about racing everything from Quads to Pro Mods to Funny Cars and how time off during COVID gave him a new perspective on life. Matt regales Buddy with stories of his early days at DSR, winning world championships and what it's like to literally be one of the biggest guys in Funny Car
